title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1010.6 - Leftover drug substances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1010.6 - Leftover drug substances

State Regulations

Substances remaining after testing and/or disciplinary
proceedings should be disposed of in accordance with NYSDOCS Departmental

Directive #4910A, "Contraband/Evidence-Handling, Storage, and

Disposition."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

1010.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
